text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Hmmm? I think I just heard the sound of a shutter…

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Ah! Hey, you hiding behind the pillar there… Yes, you! Come over here.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Do you just wanna stay there? Really? And miss your chance for a picture with Curren～?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Hmm, I'll show you a special pose then♪ Kyururun☆
